entities.description: Type of assignment of officers based on their activities, such as vehicle patrolling or detective assignments.
The number of officers involved in each type of assignment.
Categories related to the nature of assignments like two-officer vehicle, alone or assisted.
Unweighted frequency and percentage of each assignment type.
Total count of various types of officer assignments.

relationships.description: Relates the assignment type to the specific categories such as vehicle patrolling alone or with assistance.
Specifies the number of officers involved in each category of assignment.
Details the unweighted frequency and percentage data for each assignment type.
Summarizes the total number of various assignments covered in the survey.
